document_data.caption: A map showing Rauthgor in northern Mulhorand.
document_data.name: Rauthgor
document_data.mainbody: '''Rauthgor''', which was also called the '''Rainbow Falls''' was a prominent waterfall located in in the country of [[Mulhorand]].{{Cite interactive atlas|B1dlc}}
document_data.Geography: The Rainbow Falls were located in north Mulhorand where the [[River Rauthenflow]] cascaded into the [[Alamber Sea]] near the [[Cliff of Leaping Horses]].
document_data.Activity: A small fortified settlement sprung up around the waterfall as of the {{YearlinkName|1357}}.
